synopsis.text: Chu Kuangsheng lived in the remote town of Shiyang within the Shenlong Empire. Born weak and unable to train, he became the laughingstock. Three years ago, his parents went missing while his talented sister Liu'er fell ill. In an accident, Chu Kuangsheng inherited his family's ancestral technique, rapidly progressing in cultivation. Though appearing weak, he secretly has another identity - the renowned Kuangzun in the martial world. Chu discovers the leader's collusion with outsiders relates to his parents' disappearance. As Kuangzun he covertly befriends heroes, gathering strength. With one face and two identities, he eliminates the corrupt and leaves town to investigate his parents' whereabouts. Wielding his sword against heroes in the vast universe, Chu Kuangsheng becomes a master, his name resonating across myriad domains.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
